Player History
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/2/2013, off Matt Harvey (NYM)...
1/30/2014: Gets a new one-year contract worth $928,571 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 9/8/2014 with a Sprained Wrist, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 2014...
1/30/2015: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,292,857 through salary arbitration...
1/30/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,292,857 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Miami on 1/30/2016 (Going to PIT: 3B Carlos Belen, SS Jiovanni Mier. Going to MIA: 3B Pedro Alvarez)...
9/11/2016: Signed a contract extension with Miami, $1,250,000 per year, for 3 years.
Injured on 4/21/2017 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Miami to St. Louis on 2/1/2018 (Going to STL: RF Giancarlo Stanton, 3B Pedro Alvarez, P Nathan Eovaldi. Going to MIA: P Shelby Miller, LF C.J. McElroy, 3B Matt Carpenter, P Joshua Muns
on)...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 6/4/2018...
8/9/2019: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis, $10,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Was claimed off waivers by Minnesota on 5/22/2021.
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/11/2022 to a 2-year deal worth $1,550,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 7/3/2022...
10/24/2023: Signed a contract extension with Chicago (N), $1,900,000 per year, for 2 years.
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (A) on 2/5/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Chicago (N) on 2/15/2024 (Going to CHC: CF Aaron Shipman, 3B Pedro Alvarez. Going to LAA: C George Perham)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2024, hitting .529 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
10/29/2025: Signed a contract extension with Chicago (N), $8,200,000 per year, for 1 years.
